page.title: 01The village of Llangeitho.
page.content: Llangeitho is a small village set in the Aeron valley.There is a small square around which houses are clustered.There is a pub called The Three Horse Shoes,a general store and a Post Office.The couple who run the Post Office have recently come from London.There are two garages,a bus garage and a plant nursery. A doctor holds a surgery in the village once a week. People worship at St.Ceitho's Church and Gwynfil Chapel.The school has 51 pupils and the playschool has up to 10 children. Most of the villagers are Welsh but there are some English people.Mr Mackie who keeps the pub is Scottish and Mrs.Mackie is English.The majority of the houses are old with very few new buildings,though there are some new bungalows for elderly people.
